title: Week 2 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Mike Gets Nothing! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/14
description:
Waiver wire time! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode headed into Week 2! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 2 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Who should you target, and who is droppable? Plus, injury updates and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 14th, 2021.
 (02:00) - MNF Recap, Mike’s Story
 (15:50) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (26:50) - NFL News
 (31:20) - Week 2 Waivers
 (33:05) - WR Waivers
 (45:35) - RB Waivers
 (57:10) - TE Waivers 
 (01:01:10) - DST Streamers 
 (01:02:45) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
